entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
